Pilot.quote: "The wolf thought to himself, what a tender young creature. What a nice plump mouthful"

Bears Will Be Bears.quote: "She looked into the window, and then peeped through the keyhole; seeing nobody in the house, she lifted the latch."

Beeware.quote: "She'll sting you one day. Oh, ever so gently, you'll hardly even feel it. `til you fall dead."

Lonely Hearts.quote: "There she paused for a while thinking...but the temptation was so great she could not conquer it."

Danse Macabre.quote: "Out they scampered from doors, windows, and gutters, rats of every size, all after the piper."

Three Bad Wolves.quote: "Little Pig, Little pig, let me come in, said the wolf to the pig. Not by the hair of my chinny chin chin, Said the pig to the wolf."

Let Your Hair Down.quote: "The enchantress was so hard-hearted, that she banished the poor girl to a wilderness, where she had to live a miserable, wretch state."

Game Ogre.quote: "Fee Fi Fo Fum... I smell the blood of an Englishman..."

Of Mouse and Man.quote: "I am impelled not to squeak like a grateful and frightened mouse but to roar..."

Organ Grinder.quote: "We shall see the crumbs of bread...and they will show us our way home again."

Tarantella.quote: "Instantly, the priestess changed into a monstrous goblin-spider and the warrior found caught fast in her web."

Last Grimm Standing.quote: "The beast was loosed into the arena, and among them a beast of huge bulk and ferocious aspect, and then the wretched slave was cast in"

Three Coins in a Fuchsbau.quote: "For me there are neither locks nor bolts, whatsoever I desire is mine"

Plumed Serpent.quote: "Said the dragon, 'Many knights have left their lives; I shall soon have an end to you, too.' And he breathed fire out of seven jaws."

Island of Dreams.quote: "Soon he was so in love with the witch's daughter that he could think of nothing else. He lived by the light of her eyes and gladly did whatever she asked."

The Thing With Feathers.quote: "Sing my precious little golden bird, sing! I have hung my golden slipper around your neck."

Love Sick.quote: "Forgive me for the evil I have done you; my mother drove me to it; it was done it against my will."

Cat and Mouse.quote: "Perhaps some accident has befallen him,” said the king, and the next day he sent out two more huntsmen who were to search for him."

Leave It to Beavers.quote: "Wait!' the troll said, jumping in front of him. 'This is my toll bridge. You have to pay a penny to cross."

Big Feet.quote: "He stripped off his skin and tossed it into the fire and he was in human form again."

Woman in Black.quote: "It shall not be death, but a sleep of a hundred years, into which the princess shall fall."

Bad Teeth.quote: "The blood-dimmed tide is loosed, and everywhere the ceremony of innocence is drowned."

The Kiss.quote: "If a man of pure heart were to fall in love with here, that would bring her back to life."

Bad Moon Rising.quote: "She began to weep bitterly and said, 'What can a poor girl like me do now?' "
Bad Moon Rising.source: The Old Woman in the Wood

Quill.quote: "Dead stood behind him, and said: 'Follow me, the hour of your departure from this world has come' "

The Good Shepherd.quote: "Dressed in the skin, the Wolf strolled into the pasture with the SHeep. Soon a little lamb was following him about and was quickly led away to slaughter"

Over My Dead Body.quote: "Whilst he thus gazed before him, he saw a snake creep out of a corner of the vault and approach the dead body"

The Bottle Imp.quote: "'Let me out, let me out,' the spirit cried. And the boy, thinking no evil, drew the cork out of the bottle."

The Other Side.quote: "I thought of making myself a beautiful wooden marionette. It must be wonderful, one that can dance and fence and turn somersaults."

La Llorona.quote: "On many a dark night people would see her walking along the riverbank and crying for her children."

The Hour of Death.quote: "And branded upon the beast, the mark of his kin. For none shall live whom they have seen."

To Protect and Serve Man.quote: "The beast was simply the Call of the WIld personified... which some natures hear to their own destruction."

Season of the Hexenbiest.quote: "'Oh! There is a terrible witch in that house who spewed her poison over me and scratched me with her long fingernails.'"

Face Off.quote: "The will to conquer is the first condition of victory."

Natural Born Wesen.quote: "So the animals debated how they might drive the robbers out, and at last settled on an idea."
